name: How to Make Hemp Milk
description: Hemp milk is incredibly fast and easy to make, with no soaking required. Throw everything into a blender and blend until creamy, that's it! Perfect for those with nut or soy allergies.
recipeIngredient: 3-4 tablespoons pure maple syrup, or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: To a high powered blender, add the hemp seeds, water and optional ingredients and blend on high for 1-2 minutes until creamy and white.
recipeInstructions.name: To a high powered blender, add the hemp seeds, water and optional ingredients and blend on high for 1-2 minutes until creamy and white.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour into containers and store in the refrigerator for up to 4 days. It can also be frozen.
